member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Extras.ActionCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Extras.ActionCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: E:Caliburn.Micro.Extras.ActionCommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Occurs when changes occur that affect whether the command should execute.

member.name: T:Caliburn.Micro.Extras.ModuleBootstrapperBase
member.summary: Base class for all module bootstrappers.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.Extras.ModuleBootstrapperBase.ConfigureStorageMechanismsAndWorkers(Caliburn.Micro.SimpleContainer)
member.summary: Identify, load and configure all instances of and that are defined in the assembly associated with this bootstrapper.
member.remarks: Caliburn Micro will automatically load storage handlers and storage mechanisms from the assemblies configured in when is first invoked. Since the purpose of this bootstrapper is to allow the delayed loading of assemblies, it makes sense to locate the storage handlers alongside the view models in the same assembly.

member.summary: Override to setup the IoC container for this module.

member.summary: Gets or sets the IoC container.
